scripts.eslint:git-changed: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep .*\\\.ts | grep -v json`; if [ "$LIST" ]; then eslint --ignore-path .eslintignore $LIST; fi
scripts.prettier:fix:git-changed: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | egrep -i '(ts|json|md|js|html|htm)$'`; if [ -z "$LIST" ]; then exit 0; fi; echo "${LIST}" | while IFS= read -r line; do echo "prettier ----> $line" && prettier --loglevel debug --ignore-path .prettierignore "$line" --write && git add "$line"; done;
scripts.check-formatting-and-linting: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-one-file-from-js: npm run build && esbuild ./dist/src/index.js --bundle --minify --platform=node --packages=external --target=node18.12.1 --outfile=./dist/index.js --allow-overwrite && rimraf ./dist/src ./dist/test && npm run make-type-definitions
scripts.prepare: `# This installs git pre commit hook` husky install
scripts.check-env: `# This is just a test script to print out npm parsed parameters` node -e 'console.log(process.env)' | grep npm
scripts.refresh-package-locks: npm run clean && find . -iname package-lock.json -delete && npm install
scripts.preversion: npm install husky@8.0.3 -g && npm run clean && npm run install:prod && npm run build-one-file-from-js-and-mangle && npm run test
